I've just finished a Deep Look marathon with my 4 year old son. All episodes watched. What now? Veritasium? nothing new. It's OK to be Smart? nothing new. I guess it's time to get back to cooking and cleaning :)
The video, the audio, the narration - the whole production(!) - are just incredibly amazing! I have never found such a channel before until Deep Look.
Excellent job. great videos, tremendously educational. I love all of them.
I LOVE AMY'S VOICE,GREAT PRODUCTION
So thissss is what u look like 😍

Firstly, thank you for celebrating bio diversity and for not trying to draw on audience fears with scary music. Thank you for not demonizing the invertebrates as so many programs try to do, just to build an audience who undoubtedly will perpetuate ignorance. Thank you for taking a mature yet playfully curious approach to presenting information about the world around us and lastly, thank you for public broadcasting.
Thank you for these videos! They make my day✨
when u picture them in ur mind and they do not look as the same as u saw them in ur mind
I love this channel. ^_^

I can not express how I adore your amazing work! You are doing greatest popular science channel I've seen! Please, keep going that way! p.s. Amy has a wonderful voice and the way she speaks is very artistic!
informative channel. like and love this
you have got such an impressive voice
Amazing channel. Makes me open my eyes on so many things. I love it

Hi, Amy.
Deep Look just publish the videos? Or do they film them? How long does it takes to launch a new one?
I think I will not accept a new one with another voice than yours.
I live in a third world country. Even college students don't read.
I work in a team who teaches free classes. May I translate your videos into Portuguese and spread them?

I work as a para-educator for Santa Clara County Office of Education, Alternative Education Department.  Students will love to view these video during science class.  Compassion, transparency & equanimity, Sally

Love your work but self defeating because of the high volume background music. Would love to see it turned way down or even better turned off. Closed caption could help but blocks some of the images. Many of us are getting older and don't hear well. Even when using ear buds can not hear the dialog over the "music". Thanks from an old man.
Is there an index to those done so far?  Have you done one on the human microbiome.

Love your videos, quality work, and love the music as well :)
keep on posting

Absolutely love your videos.  Narration, music, editing, visuals...all exceptional!  The only criticism I can think of is ... they're too short!   I would love to see your take on tardigrades.  These virtually unknown little guys are really mysterious and so interesting.  Keep up the great work!
